TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit TypeToken extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Represents the `Token` returned by the metadata to represent a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The type of an object is also known as the class of an object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.TypeToken Empty
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to compare with this TypeToken.
Docs.summary: Checks if the given object is an instance of `TypeToken` and is equal to this instance.
Docs.returns: `true` if is an instance of `TypeToken` and is equal to this object; otherwise, `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Equals(valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.TypeToken obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeToken"> to compare to the current instance.
Docs.summary: Indicates whether the current instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeToken">.
Docs.returns: `true` if the value of is equal to the value of the current instance; otherwise, `false`.
